text: From their respective pandemic lockdowns, the three brothers became captive audiences to President Trump's coronavirus press conferences and started a blog. Opinion and aggregation soon turned into the rapid production of political videos. https://t.co/9Lyqy31OWc

entity.name: US breaks record with over 77,000 cases of COVID-19 in one day
entity.description: The death toll rose by 974, taking the country’s total to 138,201.
